puntr 1.1.3
  • Reference

Import play-by-play data Grab all play-by-play data, not just punts

import_seasons.Rd

Import play-by-play data Grab all play-by-play data, not just punts

import_seasons(years)

Arguments

years

A year or range of years between 1999 and 2019, inclusive

Value

A tibble pbp containing play-by-play data for the specified years

Examples


import_seasons(1999:2019)

#> # A tibble: 996,684 x 340
